Package controller

Class ModifyProductController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
controller for altering the product info and the part data associated with creating a product

    onActionModifyProductTableSearchBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Search box for looking up products by Part ID and Part Name FUTURE ENHANCEMENT searching in the text box requires an action of pressing enter, would be nice if it searched key press by key press FUTURE ENHANCEMENT searching requires exact CaseSensitive typing, a lowercase option that returned results would be a great enhancement
    void
    onButtonActionModifyProductAddPartButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    adds selected part from parts list and adds it the associated parts list when creating a product

    cancels product modification and redirects user to MainForm.fxml
    void

    saves current state of parts makeup for a product and submits it to products table
    void
    onButtonActionModifyRemoveAssociatedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    removes a selected part from parts list and adds it back to the associated parts list when altering a product makeup

    grabs table data of parts that makeup a product table

    • onActionModifyProductTableSearchBox

      public void onActionModifyProductTableSearchBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Search box for looking up products by Part ID and Part Name FUTURE ENHANCEMENT searching in the text box requires an action of pressing enter, would be nice if it searched key press by key press FUTURE ENHANCEMENT searching requires exact CaseSensitive typing, a lowercase option that returned results would be a great enhancement
